column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Sameet - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you weren't overly pleased with our Spicy Vegan Ramen. It's possible the ramen chef made a mistake in preparation
column3: if you're ever dissatisfied with any of our food for any reason
column4: just let your server know and he or she will make it right. We do hope you'll come through and try another bowl
column5: as we would hate to be judged by just one dish.
